It was tasty and delish. Salad was great, veggies were fresh and it came with a salad dressing which tasted like the in and out sauce. Very yummy. My bf salad was good also and his steak was also cooked medium well. Everything we ordered was great besides the rice I wish they would have cooked it better. It's okay though the service was awesome. Overall this place wasnt too bad knowing its in the southside phoenix area..
Good but the portion for the salads are really really small. I feel like the lettuce is all gone after 4 folks bites.

Food is amazing. Fresh, made to order and good prices. Service is subpar at  best. Not sure if the lady owns the place or is a cashier but I have been back several times for the food and she manages to be rude, short and irritated every time.
good fresh food place. i'm not a big salad eater. but the sandwich i got was amazing. try it out, the place really wasn't for me. but it's great, go see if it's for you.

I had the asian bbq and the korean bbq panini and wow, so amazing. The beef is so soft and tender its really amazing and the sizes were great it was 21 dollars and well spent. Im a part time vegetarian and only eat meat 2 times out of the month and i feel like i made the right choice, really reccomend this place not just for the price but the quality of the food  aw well  made my tummy smile.

I've been here twice now, and both times my meals were really tasty.  The first time I had the Thai shrimp salad, and the second time I had the Korean Beef BBQ wrap (it's listed as a sandwich, but you can get any salad or sandwich as a wrap instead, which is a nice touch).  The Korean BBQ wrap was REALLY delicious!  However, I would have preferred the red onions to have been cut into thinner slices -- I'm not a fan of chunks of red onion.  So I just picked some of them out and continued to enjoy my wrap.  

However, I have to agree with other reviewers that the portion sizes do not match the prices.  $10 for a wrap is a bit on the high side, especially for a fast food alternative.  With Subway next door selling $5 footlongs, they might want to consider lowering their prices if they're trying to attract the fast food crowd.

The food was light and fresh yet filling and the staff there Ellie ( ee-lee?) Was fantastic. She took our order and answered any questions we had about the menu. I settled on the brown rice bowl with jumbo shrimp and sweet chili sauce. She let us taste the sauces beforehand to ensure we got what we liked. They have awesome add ons you wouldn't expect like portobello mushrooms and ones you would like avocado. My coworker got a chicken spinach wrap with choice of 5 veggies and she had no complaints. The gal that took our order also made our food and brought it out to us. She was happy to bring us hot sauce etc. She later cleared our table. She did it all basically. I highly recommend. Don't let the shopping/strip mall surroundings deter you from a healthy well made food option.

I was visiting some family over thanksgiving holiday and needed something healthy to eat after gorging myself on vagina i mean vegetarian stuffing.  So I came here on Friday and had a roasted veggie salad.  It tasted really fresh and flavor was tasty without being overpowering.  So we came back on Saturday and I had a veggie Panini, again it was two thumbs up. Best Panini I have EVER had. 

I don't really know Phoenix too well, but this place is definitely a gem. I do wish they had a larger salad menu.  For a name like GreenMix, they would do good to have more than 1 vegetarian salad, but they will probably expand their menu in the future, I think the place just opened.

food was fresh and delicious and very flavorful. everything on the menu sounds great! we will definitely be back! prices are pretty good except for the fact that if you order their specialty salads, just be sure you can't get the same thing on the build your own salad menu because that is the cheaper route. we got the sweet thai chicken salad that was advertised as their special for 14 something, nothing special but it was delicious! but you could have built your own salad with chicken and same dressing and added more veg for only 10. we figured this after we got our food and was a little confused and annoyed but whatever.
We were headed to Applebee's for a salad a couple of years ago and happened upon this place. The owner took our order and made our salads and was very nice. Food and service were both great!
